headline: Political Establishment Trying Smear Madison Cawthorn
summary: Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), 26,accusedthe “establishment” of “digging stuff up” to “smear” him on Friday after a series of controversies rocked hisreelection campaign.On April 22,Politico (Lean Left bias)publishedphotographsof Cawthorn drinking and wearing lingerie; Cawthorn latersaidthe photos were taken during a “game” on a cruise ship. On Tuesday, Cawthorn was cited by the TSA for carryinga loaded guninto an airport. On Thursday, avideoemerged appearing to show Cawthorn being groped by one of his staff members. And on Friday, an anti-Cawthorn PAC filed a formalethics complaintagainst the congressman.Cawthorn, the House of Representatives’ youngest member, isno stranger to controversy. According to a timeline byThe Hill (Center bias), Cawthorn also spoke at former President Donald Trump’s Jan. 6 “Stop the Steal” rally, called Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy a “thug,” and claimed someone in Congress hadinvited him to an orgy. In response, House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy said Cawthorn needed to “turn himself around,” and theNational Review (Right bias)published an op-ed praising his primary opponent.Throughout the week, coverage of Cawthorn’s controversies was widespread across the spectrum. Left-rated outlets were more likely to publish perspectives on Cawthorn on Friday; some of these voices agreed that the Republican “establishment” was trying to hurt his campaign.
